title: Dwarven Forge Adventure #65
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Forge Workshop
rooms.description: A massive underground workshop carved from solid stone. The great forge still radiates warmth, its embers glowing faintly in the darkness. Anvils and hammers lie scattered about, covered in centuries of dust. The walls are lined with weapon racks and tool chests. Runes carved into the stone pillars pulse with a faint blue light. The air smells of coal, metal, and ancient magic.

items.name: great forge
items.description: A massive stone forge with intricate dwarven carvings and still-warm embers
items.text: Carved above the forge: 'Here Thrain Ironhammer forged the legendary weapons of Clan Ironhammer. Established in the year 1247 of the Third Age. May our fires never die.'

items.name: master tool chest
items.description: A heavy iron chest with three compartments, each marked with a different dwarven rune

items.name: master smith's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with singed edges
items.text: Master Thrain's Log: The forge was lit in 1247, and we have worked these halls for generations. Our greatest treasures lie in the vault beyond the mines. Only those who know our clan name, our sacred metal, and our home mountain may enter.

items.name: bronze mine key
items.description: A sturdy bronze key with a pickaxe symbol engraved on it

items.name: ancient weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding rusted weapons and shields bearing the clan symbol

items.name: Clan Ironhammer banner
items.description: A tattered banner showing a hammer striking an anvil
items.text: The banner of Clan Ironhammer, proudest of all dwarven clans. Our symbol: the hammer and anvil. Our metal: mithril, the silver steel. Our home: the peaks of Mount Khazad.

items.name: locked supply cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with iron bands and a bronze lock

items.name: mine tunnel map
items.description: A detailed map showing the tunnel system
items.text: Map of the Ironhammer Mines beneath Mount Khazad. The main tunnel leads to the deepest veins of mithril ore. The treasure vault lies beyond, accessible only to true members of Clan Ironhammer.

items.name: chunk of mithril ore
items.description: A piece of silvery metal that gleams even in the dim light

items.name: stone workbench
items.description: A massive workbench carved from a single piece of granite

items.name: master smithing hammer
items.description: A perfectly balanced hammer with runes etched into its head

items.name: mine tunnel entrance
items.description: A dark tunnel leading deeper into the mountain, carved with dwarven runes

rooms.name: Ancient Mine Tunnel
rooms.description: A vast tunnel system carved through solid rock by generations of dwarven miners. Mine carts sit on rusty rails, and pickaxes lean against the walls. Veins of precious metals glitter in the stone. Support beams creak overhead. The tunnel opens into a larger chamber ahead where the vault entrance stands. Lanterns hanging from the ceiling cast dancing shadows.

items.name: old mine cart
items.description: A sturdy iron cart once used to haul ore from the deep mines

items.name: miner's note
items.description: A note scrawled on a piece of slate
items.text: Day 847: We've struck the richest vein of mithril yet! Master Thrain says this silver steel will make the finest weapons in all the land. The vault is nearly full of treasures. Only Clan Ironhammer knows the way in.

items.name: exposed ore vein
items.description: A rich vein of silvery mithril ore running through the rock wall
items.text: The vein sparkles with mithril, the legendary silver steel prized by dwarves above all other metals. This is what made Clan Ironhammer wealthy and powerful.

items.name: carved support beam
items.description: A massive wooden beam with dwarven inscriptions
items.text: Inscription: 'These mines of Mount Khazad have served Clan Ironhammer for generations. May our pickaxes strike true and our forges burn bright.'

items.name: mining tool rack
items.description: A rack holding various mining tools and equipment

items.name: rusty pickaxe
items.description: An old pickaxe with the Ironhammer clan symbol stamped on it

items.name: memorial stone
items.description: A carved stone honoring fallen miners
items.text: In memory of the brave miners of Clan Ironhammer who delved too deep. They sought mithril in the darkness beneath Mount Khazad and found eternal rest. Their sacrifice enriched our clan.

items.name: vault entrance
items.description: A massive door of solid mithril, gleaming silver in the lantern light. Three questions are carved into the stone archway surrounding it.

password_questions.question: What is the name of our clan?
password_questions.hint: Check the forge inscription, banner, and various notes throughout the forge

password_questions.question: What is our sacred metal?
password_questions.hint: The clan banner and mining notes mention the silver steel they prize

password_questions.question: What mountain is our home?
password_questions.hint: Multiple inscriptions and the mining map reference the mountain

rooms.name: Dwarven Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You have reached the legendary treasure vault of Clan Ironhammer! The chamber is filled with mountains of gold coins, chests overflowing with gems, and racks of masterwork weapons and armor. Mithril ingots are stacked like cordwood along the walls. In the center, a shaft of light from above illuminates a spiral staircase leading up to the surface and freedom. The wealth of generations surrounds you.

items.name: piles of gold coins
items.description: Enormous heaps of gold coins stamped with the Ironhammer symbol

items.name: chests of gems
items.description: Multiple chests filled with rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and diamonds

items.name: stacks of mithril ingots
items.description: Perfectly forged ingots of silvery mithril, the pride of the clan

items.name: rack of masterwork weapons
items.description: Legendary weapons forged by Master Thrain himself, each a work of art

items.name: spiral staircase
items.description: A stone staircase winding upward toward daylight and freedom
items.text: The stairs lead up through the mountain to a hidden exit. Fresh air flows down from above.

rooms.win_message: You have discovered the legendary treasure vault of Clan Ironhammer! As you climb the spiral staircase, you emerge on the mountainside with the wealth and knowledge of the ancient dwarves. The secrets of the forge are yours, and you have successfully escaped the depths of Mount Khazad. You win!
